server.app.main.events package¶

server.app.main.events.game module¶

class server.app.main.events.game.GameNamespace(namespace=None)¶

Bases: flask_socketio.namespace.Namespace

Handle events on game page

on_action(data: dict)¶

calculates player turn; emits turn_info, sys_msg

on_check_active(data: dict)¶

check users allowed abilities; emits set_active

on_get_history(data: dict)¶

loads game turns from db; emits set_history

on_get_players_stat(data: dict)¶

loads players stat; emits set_players_stat

on_join(data: dict)¶

added user to room; emits join

server.app.main.events.game_room module¶

class server.app.main.events.game_room.GameRoomNamespace(namespace=None)¶

Bases: flask_socketio.namespace.Namespace

Handle events on game_room page

on_join(data: dict)¶

added user to room; emits join, get_spawn

on_leave(data: dict)¶

User leaves a room

on_set_spawn(data: dict)¶

added spawned player to game; emits set_spawn

on_start(data: dict)¶

starting Game emits start

Module contents¶

initialization of socketIO eventHandlerNamespace

Maze Game
